Clue 10 tells us the owner of the rabbit is on the right of the person driving the airplane. Therefore, the Airplane must be in position 3 or 4, but since position 3 is taken by the Argentine (and the Thai), the Airplane must be in position 4, and the Rabbit is in position 5.


Finally, clue 6 says the Argentine is between the owner of the hedgehog and the manager.
